plot: Sascha inherits the old laundromat of her grandmother, but it turns out to be a less-than-profitable business. Her regular customer Jannes helps her to find a way out of this situation.
title: Unterm Strich Null
plot_es: Sascha inherits the old laundromat of her grandmother, but it turns out to be a less-than-profitable business. Her regular customer Jannes helps her to find a way out of this situation.
plot_en: Sascha inherits the old laundromat of her grandmother, but it turns out to be a less-than-profitable business. Her regular customer Jannes helps her to find a way out of this situation.
